title: Mark McCall backs his Saracens contingent to help England to Rugby World Cup glory
text:
Leicester Tigers 10 Saracens 24

Mark McCall spoke of the pride and joy he feels at watching the crucial roles his posse of Saracens stars are playing during England's impressive bid to capture a second Webb Ellis Cup.

The director of rugby wore a broad smile after seeing his Allianz Park understudies pick up their first victory of the new Premiership campaign by overcoming Leicester at Welford Road.

The Irishman's smile widened considerably when he contemplated the possibility of Owen Farrell, Billy Vunipola and co defeating South Africa in a mouth-watering World Cup Final in Tokyo next Saturday and sitting on top of the rugby world.

McCall enthused: “England were amazing. It was one of the...
description: Mark McCall spoke of the pride and joy he feels at watching the crucial roles his posse of Saracens stars are playing during England's impressive bid to capture a second Webb Ellis Cup.
